To update the wizard status, make a POST or a GET call using basic authentication.

====URL:====
http://sendible.com/api/v2/wizard.json

====HTTP Methods:====
POST/GET

====Parameters:====
 * {{{application_id}}}: Your application id from http://sendible.com/developers.
 * {{{status}}}: The status of the wizard. Set this to {{{complete}}} once the wizard has been processed.

====Authentication:====
Basic authentication with username and password or remote API key belonging to the Sendible user.

====Success Response:====
{{{
{"status": "OK"}
}}}
